subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 粗略地估计一公斤 \({ }^{235} \mathrm{U}\) 完全裂变时释放的能量，可以采用包括直觉的任何方法，但必须使人相信。
solution:
设

\[
{ }_{92}^{235} \mathrm{U}+{ }_{0}^{1} \mathrm{n} \longrightarrow{ }_{92}^{236} \mathrm{U} \longrightarrow \mathrm{X}+\mathrm{Y}+2{ }_{0}^{1} \mathrm{n}
\]

即复核分裂为 \(A=117\) 的两个核，同时放出两个中子。在 \(A=236\) 附近每个核子的平均结合能是 7.7 MeV，而在 \(A=117\) 附近每一个核子的平均结合能为 8.6 MeV。根据这些数据一个 \({ }^{235} \mathrm{U}\) 原子裂变时一共放出能量为

\[
E=2 \times 117 \times 8.6 - 236 \times 7.7 \approx 2.0 \times 10^{2} \, \mathrm{MeV}
\]

而一公斤 \({ }^{235} \mathrm{U}\) 完全裂变时一共放出能量

\[
E_{\text{总}}=\frac{1 \, \mathrm{kg}}{235 \times 1.67 \times 10^{-27} \, \mathrm{kg}} \times 2.0 \times 10^{2} \, \mathrm{MeV} \approx 5 \times 10^{26} \, \mathrm{MeV} = 8 \times 10^{13} \, \mathrm{J}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 推导本征半导体的霍尔系数表示式。假设一个长方形样品垂直于磁场放置，所加电场沿\(x\)方向，也与磁场垂直。在稳态情况下，横向处于开路，使得磁场引起的横向电流与霍尔电场引起的横向电流相互抵消。
solution:
如图所示，长方形样品垂直于磁场放置，所加电场沿\(x\)方向，也与磁场垂直。由于洛伦兹力的作用，电子与空穴的轨迹都要向-\(y\)方向偏转，这就引起了电子和空穴的横向电流。当横向处于开路的情况下，磁场引起的横向电流，使得在样品沿\(y\)轴的两边引起电荷积累，从而在\(y\)方向建立起横向霍尔电场\(\varepsilon_{y}\)。在稳态时，由于磁场所引起的横向电流与霍尔电场引起的横向电流相互抵消，故此时\(y\)方向的净电流为零，但电子和空穴电流分别地并不为零。

设\(\left(J_{\mathrm{p}}\right)_{y}\)和\(\left(J_{\mathrm{n}}\right)_{y}\)分别表示\(y\)方向空穴和电子的电流密度，则

\[
\begin{aligned}
\left(J_{p}\right)_{y} & = p q \mu_{p} \varepsilon_{y} - p q \mu_{p}^2 \varepsilon_{x} B_{x} \\
\left(J_{n}\right)_{y} & = n q \mu_{n} \varepsilon_{y} + n q \mu_{n}^2 \varepsilon_{x} B_{x}
\end{aligned}
\]

稳态时

\[
J_{y} = \left(J_{\mathrm{p}}\right)_{y} + \left(J_{\mathrm{n}}\right)_{y} = 0
\]

由此得

\[
\left(n q \mu_{n} + p q \mu_{\mathrm{p}}\right) \varepsilon_{y} + \left(n q \mu_{n}^2 - p q \mu_{\mathrm{p}}^2\right) \varepsilon_{x} B_{x} = 0
\]

所以

\[
\varepsilon_{y} = \frac{p \mu_{p}^2 - n \mu_{n}^2}{p \mu_{p} + n \mu_{n}} \varepsilon_{x} B_{x}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 一种测量多次电离原子态寿命的方法是使用调谐于被研究离子共振波长的激光激发给定的离子束并测量强度随前进距离的变化。当共振波长为 \(4885 \, \text{Å}\) 的一特定离子束被波长为 \(4880 \, \text{Å}\) 的氯离子激光激发时，离子束速度为 \(v / c=5 \times 10^{-3}\)。计算达到共振时离子束法线与激光束所夹的角度。
solution:
设离子束向左以 \(v\) 运动，如图1.4.1在实验室中激光与离子束成 \(\varphi\) 角，在离子束的静止参照系中激光与离子束成 \(\theta\) 角，这时静止在实验室中的激光光源向右以 \(v\) 运动，离子束得到的辐射的频率由多普勒公式为

\[
\omega=\frac{\omega_{0} \sqrt{1-\beta^{2}}}{1-\beta \cos \theta}
\]

已知 \(\omega_{0}=\frac{c}{4880}\), \(\omega=\frac{c}{4885}\), \(\beta=5 \times 10^{-3}\)，故

\[
\cos \theta=-0.2024
\]

由光行差公式

\[
\tan \varphi=\frac{\sin \theta}{\gamma(\cos \theta-\beta)}
\]

得

\[
\varphi \approx 101.96^{\circ}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: A photomultiplier tube is used to measure the intensity of a light source. Assuming the light source remains constant, the current gain of the photomultiplier tube is \(10^{6}\), and the measured average anode current is \(10^{-8} \mathrm{~A}\). This measurement is obtained by averaging the current over 10 ms, meaning the time constant for the measurement is \(10^{-2} \mathrm{~s}\). Assuming electrons are emitted randomly, what is the root mean square variation of the collected charge?
solution:
The number of photoelectrons \(N\) and its fluctuation \(\Delta N\) within the measurement time constant \(\tau=10^{-2}\) seconds are given by

\[
N=r \tau=625, \quad \Delta N=\sqrt{N}=25
\]

The number of charges collected at the anode \(N^{*}\) and its fluctuation \(\Delta N^{*}\) are

\[
\begin{gathered}
N^{*}=625 \times 10^{6} \\
\Delta N^{*}=\sqrt{N^{*}}=25 \times 10^{3}
\end{gathered}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 大气层屏蔽掉外层空间射向地球的大部分电磁辐射。试对\(\mathrm{H}_{2} \mathrm{O}\) 的转动激发吸收的基本屏蔽过程求出近似的光子能量。
solution:
分子的转动谱为:

\[
E_{\mathrm{n}} = 2 n B
\]

其中： \(n=0,1,2, \cdots,\ B=\frac{h^{2}}{8 \pi^{2} I},\ I\) 为转动惯量。  
\(\mathrm{H}_{2} \mathrm{O}\) 的主转动惯量数量级为 \(10^{-47} \mathrm{~kg} \cdot \mathrm{m}^{2}\)，因而 \(B \sim 10^{-21} \mathrm{~J}\)。光子能量为:

\[
\varepsilon = \Delta E_{1,0} = 2B \sim 10^{-21} \mathrm{~J}
\]

problem: 求解并比较在 300 K 下高补偿掺杂 \( \mathrm{Si} \) 和本征 \( \mathrm{Si} \) 的最小电导率。
solution:
对于 \( \mathrm{Si}: n_i = 1.5 \times 10^{10} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}, \mu_n = 1350 \ \mathrm{cm}^2/\mathrm{V}\cdot\mathrm{s}, \mu_p = 500 \ \mathrm{cm}^2/\mathrm{V}\cdot\mathrm{s} \)，则

本征电导率为：

\[
\sigma_i = 4.44 \times 10^{-6} (\Omega\mathrm{cm})^{-1}
\]

最小电导率为：

\[
\sigma_{\text{min}} = 3.95 \times 10^{-6} (\Omega\mathrm{cm})^{-1}
\]

高补偿掺杂 \( \mathrm{Si} \) 的最小电导率比本征电导率稍低，说明掺杂可能获得更高的电阻率。

subject: Semiconductor Physics
topic: Statistical Distribution of Electrons and Holes in Space
solution:
The onset temperature for saturation ionization, \( T_1 \), can be determined using the equation derived in problem 1.2.18:

\[
\frac{N_{\mathrm{D}}}{N_{C}} \mathrm{e}^{\frac{E_{\mathrm{B}}}{k_{B} T}} = \frac{1}{40}
\]

The effective density of states at the conduction band edge, \(N_{C}\), for silicon is expressed as:

\[
N_{C} = 2 \cdot \frac{\left(2 \pi k_{B}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}}}{h^{3}} \cdot T^{\frac{3}{2}} \cdot m_{d}^{\frac{3}{2}} \cdot M_{C}
\]

For silicon, the number at the conduction band edge, \(M_{C}=6\), and the effective mass for silicon electrons, \(m_{d}\), is calculated as:

\[
m_{d}=\left[0.98 \times(0.19)^{2}\right]^{\frac{1}{3}} m_{0}=0.328 m_{0}
\]

This yields:

\[
\begin{aligned}
\left(m_{d}\right)^{\frac{3}{2}} M_{C} & = 9.812 \times 10^{-52} \cdot\left[\frac{\mathrm{W} \cdot \mathrm{s}^{3}}{\mathrm{cm}^{2}}\right]^{\frac{3}{2}}
\end{aligned}
\]

Substituting into the equation, we get:

\[
\mathrm{e}^{\frac{E_{I}}{k_{B} T}} = 1.363 \times 10^{14} \times T^{\frac{3}{2}} \times \frac{1}{N_{\mathrm{D}}}
\]

With the exponential factor:

\[
\frac{E_{I}}{k_{B}} = 522.2
\]

The onset temperature equation for saturation ionization:

\[
\mathrm{e}^{\frac{5.222 \times 10^{2}}{T}} = 1.363 \times 10^{14} \times \frac{1}{N_{\mathrm{D}}} \times T^{\frac{3}{2}}
\]

Taking the logarithm on both sides:

\[
\frac{5.222 \times 10^{2}}{T} = \ln \frac{1.363 \times 10^{14}}{N_{\mathrm{D}}} + \frac{3}{2} \ln T
\]

For \(N_{\mathrm{D}} = 1 \times 10^{17} \ \text{cm}^{-3}\), solve:

\[
\frac{3}{2} \ln T - \frac{522.20}{T} - 6.598 = 0
\]

Resolved using Newton-Raphson iteration, the solution is \(T_{1}=281 \ \text{K}\).

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 硅中，能隙是 1.14 eV，空穴有效质量 \(m_{\mathrm{h}} \approx 0.3 m\)，电子有效质量 \(m_{\mathrm{e}} = 0.2 m\)。要掺入多大浓度的施主杂质砷（As），才能使室温下非本征电导率比本征电导率高 \(10^{4}\) 倍以上？（忽略受主杂质，静态介电常数为 \(\varepsilon = 11.8\)）
solution:
由于 \(np = f(T)\)，表明在一定温度下，任何非简并半导体的热平衡载流子的乘积与所含杂质无关，因此，对于本征半导体 \((n=p=n_{i})\) 同样成立，故有 \(np = n_{i}^{2}\)。

对于本征半导体，其电导率为

\[
\sigma_{i} = e n_{i}(\mu_{e} + \mu_{h}) \approx 2 e n_{i} \mu_{e}
\]

若掺入施主杂质浓度为 \(N_{D}\)，在常温下，\(n \approx N_{D}\)，并忽略受主杂质的影响，则材料的电导率为

\[
\sigma = e \mu_{e} N_{D}
\]

按题意

\[
\frac{\sigma}{\sigma_{i}} = \frac{N_{D}}{2 n_{i}} = 10^{4}
\]

式中

\[
\begin{aligned}
n_{i} & =\frac{2(2 \pi k_{B} T)^{3/2} (m_{e} m_{h})^{3/4}}{\hbar^{3}} e^{-E_{g} / 2 k_{B} T} \\
& = 2.509 \times 10^{19} \times (0.2 \times 0.3)^{3/4} e^{-1.14 / (2 \times 0.026)} \\
& = 9.15 \times 10^{8} \, \text{cm}^{-3}
\end{aligned}
\]

则

\[
N_{D} = 2 \times 10^{4} n_{i} = 1.83 \times 10^{13} \, \text{cm}^{-3}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
topic: Statistical Distribution of Electrons and Holes in Space
problem:
For a one-dimensional crystal with lattice constant \(a\), the energy near the conduction band minimum \(E_{C}(k)\) is given by

\[
E_{C}(k)=\frac{h^{2} k^{2}}{3 m_{0}}+\frac{h^{2}\left(k-k_{1}\right)^{2}}{m_{0}}
\]

The energy near the valence band maximum \(E_{V}(k)\) is given by

\[
E_{V}(k)=\frac{h^{2} k_{1}^{2}}{6 m_{0}}-\frac{3 h^{2} k^{2}}{m_{0}}
\]

where \(m_{0}\) is the electron mass, \(k_{1}=\frac{1}{2 a}, a=3.14 \times 10^{-10} \mathrm{~m}\). Determine the band gap width.
solution:
The band gap width is given by

\[
E_{g}=E_{C_{\min }}(k)-E_{V_{\max }}(k)
\]

The conduction band minimum occurs at \(k=\frac{3}{4} k_{1}\), thus

\[
E_{C_{\min }}\left(k=\frac{3}{4} k_{1}\right)=\frac{h^{2}\left(\frac{3}{4} k_{1}\right)^{2}}{3 m_{0}}+\frac{h^{2}\left(\frac{1}{4} k_{1}\right)^{2}}{m_{0}}=\frac{1}{4 m_{0}} h^{2} k_{1}^{2}
\]

The valence band maximum occurs at \(k=0\); thus

\[
E_{V_{\max }}(k=0)=\frac{h^{2} k_{1}^{2}}{6 m_{0}}
\]

Therefore, the band gap width is

\[
\begin{aligned}
E_{g} & =E_{C_{\min }}-E_{V_{\max }}=\frac{1}{4 m_{0}} h^{2} k_{1}^{2}-\frac{h^{2} k_{1}^{2}}{6 m_{0}}=\frac{1}{12 m_{0}} \cdot h^{2} k_{1}^{2} \\
& =\frac{\left(6.63 \times 10^{-34}\right)^{2}}{12 \times 9.1 \times 10^{-31}} \times \frac{1}{4 \times\left(3.14 \times 10^{-10}\right)^{2}} \\
& =1.02 \times 10^{-19} \, \mathrm{J} = 0.64 \, \mathrm{eV}
\end{aligned}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: Calculate and compare the minimum conductivity of heavily compensated doped \( \mathrm{Ge} \) and intrinsic \( \mathrm{Ge} \) at 300 K.
solution:
For \( \mathrm{Ge}: n_i = 2.4 \times 10^{13} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}, \mu_n = 3900 \ \mathrm{cm}^2/\mathrm{V}\cdot\mathrm{s}, \mu_p = 1900 \ \mathrm{cm}^2/\mathrm{V}\cdot\mathrm{s} \), the intrinsic conductivity is:

\[
\sigma_i = n_i e (\mu_n + \mu_p) = 2.23 \times 10^{-2} (\Omega\mathrm{cm})^{-1}
\]

The minimum conductivity is:

\[
\sigma_{\text{min}} = 2 n_i e \sqrt{\mu_n \mu_p} = 2.09 \times 10^{-2} (\Omega\mathrm{cm})^{-1}
\]

The minimum conductivity of heavily compensated doped \( \mathrm{Ge} \) is slightly lower than the intrinsic conductivity, indicating that doping can achieve a higher resistivity.

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: Within an error range of 10, use estimation, rough calculation, or memorization to answer the following question: What is the de Broglie wavelength of the Earth? Please explain in detail how you arrived at your answer.
solution:
The Earth's orbital speed is \(3 \times 10^{4} \mathrm{~m/s}\), and its mass is \(6 \times 10^{24} \mathrm{~kg}\), so its momentum is

\[
p = m v = 1.8 \times 10^{29} \mathrm{~Ns}
\]

Thus,

\[
\lambda = \frac{h}{p} = \frac{6.63 \times 10^{-34}}{1.8 \times 10^{29}} = 3.7 \times 10^{-63} \mathrm{~m}
\]

problem: A single crystal of Ge with a mass of 0.1 kg is doped with \(3.2 \times 10^{-9} \mathrm{~kg}\) of Sb, assuming that the impurities are fully ionized. Calculate the concentration of Sb impurities in this Ge single crystal. Given that the density of the Ge single crystal is \(5.32 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{cm}^{3}\), and the atomic mass of Sb is 121.8.
solution:
The volume of the Ge single crystal is 

\[ 
V = \frac{0.1 \times 10^{3}}{5.32} \mathrm{~cm}^{3} 
\]

Thus, the concentration of antimony impurities \(N_{\mathrm{D}}\) in the single crystal is

\]

problem:
2) 计算定积分

\[
\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} x \frac{1}{\left(a^{2}+x^{2}\right)^{2}}
\]

其中 \(a\) 为实数。
solution:
计算积分

\[
I=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{d} x \frac{1}{\left(a^{2}+x^{2}\right)^{2}}=\int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{(x-|a| \mathrm{i})^{2}(x+|a| \mathrm{i})^{2}}
\]

采用留数定理，取如图闭路 \(C\)。

\[
f(z)=\frac{1}{(z-|a| \mathrm{i})^{2}(z+|a| \mathrm{i})^{2}}
\]

在 \(C\) 内有一个二级极点 \(z=|a| \mathrm{i}\) 。

所以

\[
\begin{aligned}
I & =2 \pi \mathrm{i} \lim _{z \rightarrow |a| \mathrm{i}} \frac{\mathrm{~d}}{\mathrm{~d} z}\left[(z+|a| \mathrm{i})^{2} \frac{1}{(z-|a| \mathrm{i})^{2}}\right] \\
& =2 \pi \mathrm{i} \lim _{z \rightarrow |a| \mathrm{i}} \frac{-2}{(z+|a| \mathrm{i})^{3}} \\
& =2 \pi \mathrm{i} \frac{-2}{-8|a|^{3} \mathrm{i}} = \frac{\pi}{2|a|^{3}}
\end{aligned}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 确定下列陈述是否正确，并说明理由。能量差为 \(10^{-3} \, \text{eV}\)，寿命均为 \(10^{-10}\) 秒的两个态能被清楚地分辨，这两个态不相互衰变。
solution:
行。因为既然能级的寿命是 \(10^{-10}\) 秒，所以能级就有一定的宽度，当这个宽度大于 \(10^{-3} \, \text{eV}\) 则两能级部分重合无法分辨。由测不准关系可知能级的宽度 \(\Delta E\)：

\[
\Delta E \cdot \Delta t \approx \frac{\hbar}{2} \Rightarrow \Delta E \approx \frac{\hbar}{2 \Delta t}
\]

计算得

\[
\Delta E \approx \frac{6.58 \times 10^{-16}}{2 \times 10^{-10}} = 3.29 \times 10^{-6} \, \text{eV} < 10^{-3} \, \text{eV}
\]

所以可以分辨。

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem:
继续求解非齐次微分方程

\[
f^{\prime \prime}(x) + 2z f^{\prime}(x) + k^{2} f(x) = \delta(x-x_{0})
\]

利用傅里叶变换方法寻找原方程的一个特解。
solution:
使用傅里叶变换，设

\[
f(x) = \frac{1}{2\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} g(P) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} P(x-x_{0})} \mathrm{d}P
\]

给定：

\[
\delta(x-x_{0}) = \frac{1}{2\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} P(x-x_{0})} \mathrm{d}P
\]

代入原方程后，解出：

\[
g(P) = \frac{1}{k^{2} + 2z \mathrm{i} P - P^{2}}
\]

于是特解可由下述积分给出：

\[
f(x) = \frac{1}{2\pi} \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i} P(x-x_{0})}}{k^{2} + 2z \mathrm{i} P - P^{2}} \mathrm{d}P
\]

参考狄拉克函数的性质和分析奇点位置，得：

上半平面奇点为

\[
P^{2} - 2z \mathrm{i} P - k^{2} = 0 \\
P = \mathrm{i} z \pm \sqrt{k^{2} - z^{2}} \quad (z > 0)
\]

选取上半平面的积半径回路（如图2.2.1所示）:

\[
\begin{aligned}
f(x) = & -\frac{1}{2\pi} \theta(x-x_{0}) 2\pi \mathrm{i} \\
& \cdot \left[\frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i}(x-x_{0})(\mathrm{i}z+\sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}})}}{2\sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}}} - \frac{\mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i}(x-x_{0})(\mathrm{i}z-\sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}})}}{2\sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}}}\right]
\end{aligned}
\]

最终求得特解为：

\[
\begin{aligned}
& = \theta(x-x_{0}) \mathrm{e}^{\mathrm{i}(x-x_{0}) \mathrm{i}z} \frac{\sin((x-x_{0}) \sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}})}{\sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}}} \\
& = \theta(x-x_{0}) \frac{\sin((x-x_{0}) \sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}})}{\sqrt{k^{2}-z^{2}}} e^{-(x-x_{0})z}
\end{aligned}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: A \(1 \, \Omega \, \mathrm{cm}\) n-type silicon sample is illuminated, uniformly generating non-equilibrium carriers at an electron-hole pair generation rate of \(10^{17} \, \mathrm{cm}^{-3} \cdot \mathrm{s}^{-1}\). Assume the lifetime of the sample is \(10 \, \mu \mathrm{s}\) and the surface recombination velocity is \(100 \, \mathrm{cm/s}\). Calculate the number of holes recombined per unit area per unit time within three diffusion lengths from the surface.
solution:
The steady-state equation is given by

\[
D_{\mathrm{p}} \frac{\partial^{2} \Delta p(x)}{\partial x^{2}} - \frac{\Delta p(x)}{\tau_{\mathrm{p}}} + g_{\mathrm{p}} = 0
\]

The general solution to the equation is

\[
\Delta p(x) = A \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{x}{L_{\mathrm{p}}}} + B \mathrm{e}^{\frac{x}{L_{\mathrm{p}}}} + g_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}
\]

Boundary conditions are

\[
\begin{cases}
\Delta p(\infty) = \tau_{p} g_{p} \\
\left. D_{p} \frac{\partial \Delta p(x)}{\partial x} \right|_{x=0} = S_{p} [p(0) - p_{0}] = \Delta p(0) S_{p}
\end{cases}
\]

From boundary condition (1), we obtain \(B=0\), and the solution becomes

\[
\Delta p(x) = A \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{x}{L_{\mathrm{p}}}} + g_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}
\]

From boundary condition (2), we find

\[
A = -\tau_{\mathrm{p}} g_{\mathrm{p}} \frac{S_{\mathrm{p}} L_{\mathrm{p}}}{D_{\mathrm{p}} + S_{\mathrm{p}} L_{\mathrm{p}}} = -\tau_{\mathrm{p}} g_{\mathrm{p}} \frac{S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}}{L_{\mathrm{p}} + S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}}
\]

Thus, the solution is

\[
\Delta p(x) = \tau_{\mathrm{p}} g_{\mathrm{p}} \left\{ 1 - \frac{S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}}{L_{\mathrm{p}} + S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}} e^{-\frac{x}{L_{\mathrm{p}}}} \right\}
\]

(2) \(\Delta P = \int_{0}^{3 L_{\mathrm{p}}} \frac{\Delta p(x)}{\tau_{\mathrm{p}}} \mathrm{d} x = \int_{0}^{3 L_{\mathrm{p}}} g_{\mathrm{p}} \left( 1 - \frac{S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}}{L_{\mathrm{p}} + S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}} e^{-\frac{x}{L_{\mathrm{p}}}} \right) \mathrm{d} x\)

\[
\begin{aligned}
& = g_{\mathrm{p}} \left( 3 L_{\mathrm{p}} - \left. \frac{S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}}{L_{\mathrm{p}} + S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}} L_{\mathrm{p}} \mathrm{e}^{-\frac{x}{L_{\mathrm{p}}}} \right|_{3 L_{\mathrm{p}}}^{0} \right) = g_{\mathrm{p}} L_{\mathrm{p}} \left[ 3 - \frac{S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}}{L_{\mathrm{p}} + S_{\mathrm{p}} \tau_{\mathrm{p}}} \left( 1 - \mathrm{e}^{-3} \right) \right] \\
& = 3.33 \times 10^{15} \, \mathrm{cm}^{-2} \, \mathrm{s}^{-1}
\end{aligned}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: At the temperature of liquid nitrogen, intrinsic germanium is excited by light to produce conduction electrons, with an average density of \(1 \times 10^{12} \mathrm{~cm}^{-3}\). At this temperature, the mobilities of electrons and holes are equal, \(\mu=0.5 \times 10^{4} \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{V} \cdot \mathrm{s}\). If a 100 V voltage is applied to a cubic crystal with a side length of 1 cm, what is the approximate current produced?
solution:
Current density

\[
j=\sigma E=\left(n \mu_{\mathrm{n}}+p \mu_{\mathrm{p}}\right) e E=2 n \mu_{\mathrm{n}} e \frac{V}{d}
\]

Substituting \(n=1 \times 10^{12} \mathrm{~cm}^{-3}, \mu_{\mathrm{n}}=0.5 \times 10^{4} \mathrm{~cm}^{2} / \mathrm{V} \cdot \mathrm{s}, V=100 \mathrm{~V}, d=1 \mathrm{~cm}\), we get

\[
j=1.6 \times 10^{3} \mathrm{~A} / \mathrm{m}^{2}
\]

Therefore, the current

\[
I=j S=1.6 \times 10^{3} \times 1 \times 10^{-4}=0.16(\mathrm{~A})=160(\mathrm{~mA})
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem:
在超导转变温度 \(T_{\mathrm{c}}\) 以下, 总传导电子数中有 \(\frac{n_{0}}{n}\) 部分的电子能参与超导电流, \(n_{s}\) 称为超导电子数密度。简单超导体的伦敦方程将超导电流和磁矢势 \(A\) 联系起来

\[
j_{s}=-\frac{n_{s} e^{2}}{m_{0} c} A
\]

这里 \(m_{0}\) 是电子质量。利用合适的麦克斯韦方程证明如何由方程(1)得出迈斯纳效应。伦敦穿透深度为何？
solution:
迈斯纳效应是指超导体的完全抗磁性, 即当处于超导态时, 超导体内磁场总为零。

由伦敦方程

\[
j_{s}=-\frac{n_{s} e^{2}}{m_{0} c} A=-\frac{1}{c \Lambda^{2}} A
\]

式中, \(\Lambda^{2}=\frac{m_{0}}{n_{s} e^{2}}\)。于是，磁感应强度

\[
\boldsymbol{B}=\nabla \times \boldsymbol{A}=-\nabla \times \boldsymbol{A}=-\nabla \times c\Lambda^{2} \boldsymbol{j}_{s}
\]

而按麦克斯韦方程

\[
\nabla \times \boldsymbol{B}=\frac{4 \pi}{c} \boldsymbol{j}_{s}
\]

因此

\[
\begin{aligned}
\boldsymbol{B} & =-c \Lambda^{2} \nabla \times \boldsymbol{j}_{s}=-\frac{c^{2}}{4 \pi} \Lambda^{2} \nabla \times \nabla \times \boldsymbol{B} \\
& =-\lambda_{L}^{2}\left[\nabla \operatorname{div} \boldsymbol{B}-\nabla^{2} \boldsymbol{B}\right]
\end{aligned}
\]

因为磁场是无散场, \(\operatorname{div} \boldsymbol{B}=\nabla \cdot \boldsymbol{B}=0\)。因此有

\[
\nabla^{2} \boldsymbol{B}=-\frac{1}{\lambda_{L}^{2}} \boldsymbol{B}
\]

式中

\[
\lambda_{\mathrm{L}}=\left(\frac{c^{2}}{4 \pi} \Lambda^{2}\right)^{1 / 2}=\left(\frac{m_{0} c^{2}}{4 \pi n_{s} e^{2}}\right)^{1 / 2}
\]

为伦敦穿透深度，对于大多数具有超导性的金属元素，穿透深度约为 \(10^{-8} \sim 10^{-7} \mathrm{~m}\)。

其解为

\[
\boldsymbol{B}=\boldsymbol{B}_{0} \exp \left(-\frac{x}{\lambda_{\mathrm{L}}}\right)
\]

是按指数衰减的，当 \(x \gg \lambda_{\mathrm{L}}\) 时， \(\boldsymbol{B} \rightarrow 0\)，这表明，磁场仅存在于超导体表面厚度比 \(\lambda_{\mathrm{L}}\) 小的薄层内，即超导体内磁场为零。此即迈斯纳效应。

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 假定在前一问题中，自旋平行的传导电子之间有相互作用能 \(-V\)，\( V>0\)，即可以对传导电子之间的交换作用的效应作一近似。问磁化强度应作怎样的修正？
solution:
当自旋相互平行的电子有相互作用能 \(V\) 时

\[
\begin{aligned}
E_{+\mathrm{tot}} & =\frac{3}{10} N E_{\mathrm{F}} (1+x)^{5/3}-\frac{1}{2} \mu_{B} B N(1+x)-\frac{1}{8} V N^{2}(1+x)^{2}
\end{aligned}
\]

类似地

\[
E_{-\mathrm{tot}} = \frac{3}{10} N E_{\mathrm{F}}(1-x)^{5/3}+\frac{1}{2} \mu_{\mathrm{B}} B N(1-x)-\frac{1}{8} V N^{2}(1-x)^{2}
\]

所以电子气的总能量

\[
\begin{aligned}
E_{\text{tot}} & = E_{+\text{tot}}+E_{-\mathrm{tot}} \\
& = \frac{3}{10} N E_{\mathrm{F}}\left[(1+x)^{5/3}+(1-x)^{5/3}\right]-\mu_{\mathrm{B}} B N x \\
& \quad -\frac{1}{8} V N^{2} \left[(1+x)^{2}+(1-x)^{2}\right]
\end{aligned}
\]

由 \(\frac{\partial E_{\text{tot}}}{\partial x}=0\), 有

\[
x=\frac{3 \mu_{\mathrm{B}} B}{2 E_{\mathrm{F}}-\frac{2}{3} N V}
\]

故磁化强度 \(M\) 为

\[
M=N x \mu_{\mathrm{B}}=\frac{3 \mu_{\mathrm{B}}^{2} N}{2 E_{\mathrm{F}}-\frac{2}{3} N V} B
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
topic: Statistical Distribution of Electrons and Holes in Space
solution:
The onset temperature for saturation ionization, \( T_1 \), can be determined using the equation derived in problem 1.2.18:

\[
\frac{3}{2} \ln T - \frac{522.20}{T} + 0.309 = 0
\]

This is a transcendental equation and is resolved graphically or using the Newton-Raphson iteration method, yielding the solution \(T_{1}=77 \ \text{K}\).

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: The Earth's atmosphere shields most of the electromagnetic radiation coming from outer space. Calculate the approximate photon energy for the fundamental absorption process associated with the rotational excitation of \(\mathrm{H}_{2} \mathrm{O}\).
solution:
The rotational spectrum of a molecule is given by:

\[
E_{\mathrm{n}} = 2 n B
\]

Where: \(n=0,1,2, \cdots,\ B=\frac{h^{2}}{8 \pi^{2} I},\ I\) is the moment of inertia.  
The principal moment of inertia of \(\mathrm{H}_{2} \mathrm{O}\) is of the order of \(10^{-47} \mathrm{~kg} \cdot \mathrm{m}^{2}\), hence \(B \sim 10^{-21} \mathrm{~J}\). The photon energy is:

\[
\varepsilon = \Delta E_{1,0} = 2B \sim 10^{-21} \mathrm{~J}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem: 求出球对称且在无穷远处为 0 的方程 \(\left(\nabla^{2}+k^{2}\right) U(r)=-4 \pi \delta(r)\) 的解。
solution:
若 \(r \neq 0\)，则

\[
\begin{aligned}
& \frac{1}{r} \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{d} r^{2}}(r U)+k^{2} U=0 \\
& \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{d} r^{2}}(r U)+k^{2}(r U)=0
\end{aligned}
\]

所以

\[
r U=c e^{ \pm i k r} \Rightarrow U=\frac{c}{r} e^{ \pm i k r}
\]

一般解为

\[
U=\frac{c_{1} e^{i k r}+c_{2} e^{-i k r}}{r}
\]

当 \(r \rightarrow 0\) 时，\(\nabla^{2} U \gg k^{2} U\)。所以

\[
\nabla^{2} U \approx-4 \pi \delta(r)
\]

由上题知

\[
\begin{gathered}
U=\frac{1}{r}, c_{1}+c_{2}=1 \\
U=\frac{(1-c_{2}) e^{i k r}+c_{2} e^{-i k r}}{r}=\frac{e^{i k r}+c_{2}(e^{-i k r}-e^{i k r})}{r}
\end{gathered}
\]
answers: \boxed{U = \frac{e^{i k r} + c_2(e^{-i k r} - e^{i k r})}{r}}

subject: Semiconductor Physics
topic: Statistical Distribution of Electrons and Holes in Space
problem:
In a state near the top of the valence band with wave vector \(k\), the electron energy is given by the following equation:

\[
E = -1 \times 10^{-37} k^{2}\ (\mathrm{J})
\]

If an electron is removed from the state \(k_{1} = 1 \times 10^{9}\ \mathrm{m}^{-1}\), while all other states are occupied by electrons, calculate the velocity of the hole.
solution:
The velocity of the electron in the state \(k_{1} = 1 \times 10^{9}\ \mathrm{m}^{-1}\) is given by

\[
v_{\mathrm{e}} = \left.\frac{1}{\hbar} \frac{\mathrm{d}E}{\mathrm{d}k}\right|_{k=k_{1}} = \frac{-2 \times 1 \times 10^{-37} \times 1 \times 10^{9}}{1.055 \times 10^{-34}} = -1.9 \times 10^{6}\ (\mathrm{m/s})
\]

The velocity of the hole in the state \(k_{1} = 1 \times 10^{9}\ \mathrm{m}^{-1}\) is equal to the velocity of the electron in that state:

\[
v_{\mathrm{h}} = v_{\mathrm{e}} = -1.9 \times 10^{6}\ (\mathrm{m/s})
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
topic: Statistical Distribution of Electrons and Holes in Space
problem: 一块补偿硅材料。已知掺入受主杂质浓度 \(N_{A} = 1 \times 10^{15} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}\)，室温下测得其费米能级位置恰好与施主能级重合，并测得热平衡时电子浓度 \(n = 5 \times 10^{15} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}\)。已知室温下硅本征载流子浓度 \(n_{i} = 1.5 \times 10^{10} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}\)。试问电离杂质及中性杂质散射中心各为多少？
solution:
由于受主杂质全电离，故电离受主散射中心

\[
N_{A}^{-} = 1 \times 10^{15} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}
\]

费米能级与施主能级重合，施主杂质部分电离，故电离施主散射中心

\[
N_{\mathrm{D}}^{+} = N_{\mathrm{D}} - n_{\mathrm{D}} = N_{\mathrm{D}} - \frac{2}{3} N_{\mathrm{D}} = \frac{1}{3} N_{\mathrm{D}} = 6 \times 10^{15} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}
\]

中性散射中心，即未电离的施主杂质浓度

\[
\frac{2}{3} N_{\mathrm{D}} = n_{\mathrm{D}} = 1.2 \times 10^{16} \ \mathrm{cm}^{-3}
\]

subject: Semiconductor Physics
problem:
一均匀细长的硬钢磁针，长 \(12 \, \text{cm}\)，由一根无扭矩的线悬挂在地磁场的水平面上，并绕中心作自由的小角度振动，振动周期为 \(3 \sim 5 \, \text{秒}\)。估算钢的磁化强度。假设地磁场为均匀磁场 \(\boldsymbol{B}=B \hat{e}_x\)。设钢的密度为 \(\rho\)，钢针的振动频率为 \(\omega\)。

计算频率 \(\omega\) 的表达式。
solution:
由振动方程

\[
I \ddot{\theta}=-\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{d} \theta}(-\bar{\mu} \cdot \boldsymbol{B})=-V M B \sin \theta
\]

定义钢针体积为 \(V\)，磁化强度为 \(M\)，总磁矩为 \(\bar{\mu}=V M\)，夹角为 \(\theta\)。

设转动惯量为

\[
I=\frac{1}{12} m l^{2}=\frac{1}{12} \rho V l^{2}
\]

对于小振动，\(\sin \theta \approx \theta\)，上式可简化为

\[
\frac{1}{12} \rho V l^{2} \ddot{\theta} + V M B \theta = 0
\]

从而振动频率

\[
\omega^{2}=\frac{V M B}{\frac{1}{12} \rho V l^{2}}=\frac{12 B M}{\rho l^{2}}
\]
